quote: Love yourself. It is important to stay positive because beauty comes from the inside out.
name: Jenn Proske

quote: The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams.
name: Eleanor Roosevelt

quote: Beauty is power; a smile is its sword.
name: John Ray

quote: Loneliness adds beauty to life. It puts a special burn on sunsets and makes night air smell better.
name: Henry Rollins

quote: Beauty is when you can appreciate yourself. When you love yourself, that's when you're most beautiful.
name: Zoe Kravitz

quote: Never lose an opportunity of seeing anything beautiful, for beauty is God's handwriting.
name: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: Take care of your inner, spiritual beauty. That will reflect in your face.
name: Dolores del Rio

quote: Beauty has so many forms, and I think the most beautiful thing is confidence and loving yourself.
name: Kiesza

quote: Let the beauty of what you love be what you do.
name: Rumi

quote: The soul that sees beauty may sometimes walk alone.
name: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quote: Nature's beauty is a gift that cultivates appreciation and gratitude.
name: Louie Schwartzberg

quote: Beauty is truth's smile when she beholds her own face in a perfect mirror.
name: Rabindranath Tagore

quote: Everything has beauty, but not everyone sees it.
name: Confucius

quote: Beauty is how you feel inside, and it reflects in your eyes. It is not something physical.
name: Sophia Loren

quote: If the path be beautiful, let us not ask where it leads.
name: Anatole France

quote: No beauty shines brighter than that of a good heart.
name: Shanina Shaik

quote: Think of all the beauty still left around you and be happy.
name: Anne Frank

quote: In life, as in art, the beautiful moves in curves.
name: Edward G. Bulwer-Lytton

quote: By plucking her petals, you do not gather the beauty of the flower.
name: Rabindranath Tagore

quote: Love of beauty is taste. The creation of beauty is art.
name: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: Beauty is not just a white girl. It's so many different flavors and shades.
name: Queen Latifah

quote: It's nice to just embrace the natural beauty within you.
name: Victoria Justice

quote: Imperfection is beauty, madness is genius and it's better to be absolutely ridiculous than absolutely boring.
name: Marilyn Monroe

quote: True beauty is born through our actions and aspirations and in the kindness we offer to others.
name: Alek Wek

quote: There is no real beauty without some slight imperfection.
name: James Salter

quote: The best part of beauty is that which no picture can express.
name: Francis Bacon

quote: Beauty is being comfortable and confident in your own skin.
name: Iman

quote: Beauty of expression is so akin to the voice of the sea.
name: George Matthew Adams

quote: Beauty surrounds us, but usually we need to be walking in a garden to know it.
name: Rumi

quote: The problem with beauty is that it's like being born rich and getting poorer.
name: Joan Collins

quote: Beauty is in the eye of the beer holder.
name: Kinky Friedman

quote: I would define, in brief, the poetry of words as the rhythmical creation of Beauty.
name: Edgar Allan Poe

quote: A thing of beauty is a joy forever: its loveliness increases; it will never pass into nothingness.
name: John Keats

quote: I love natural beauty, and I think it's your best look, but I think makeup as an artist is so transformative.
name: Marina and the Diamonds

quote: The world's biggest power is the youth and beauty of a woman.
name: Chanakya

quote: Life isn't always really glamorous and fabulous. It's about encouraging people to go back to natural beauty.
name: Zoe Foster Blake

quote: To me, beauty and makeup and color is like the finishing touch on everything.
name: Marc Jacobs

quote: Anyone who keeps the ability to see beauty never grows old.
name: Franz Kafka

quote: O, thou art fairer than the evening air clad in the beauty of a thousand stars.
name: Christopher Marlowe

quote: Beauty without expression is boring.
name: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: Gorgeous hair is the best revenge.
name: Ivana Trump

quote: We needed something to express our joy, our beauty, our power. And the rainbow did that.
name: Gilbert Baker

quote: Flowers... are a proud assertion that a ray of beauty outvalues all the utilities of the world.
name: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: Love is the beauty of the soul.
name: Saint Augustine

quote: I think every single imperfection adds to your beauty. I'd rather be imperfect than perfect.
name: Sonam Kapoor

quote: Art can never exist without naked beauty displayed.
name: William Blake

quote: Beauty is everywhere a welcome guest.
name: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quote: Beauty is eternity gazing at itself in a mirror.
name: Khalil Gibran

quote: Heat cannot be separated from fire, or beauty from The Eternal.
name: Dante Alighieri

quote: The beauty of my journey is that it's always been pretty unpredictable, so stay tuned.
name: Andreja Pejic

quote: I believe in the power of great clothing. It can evoke confidence, beauty, and a sense of glamour.
name: Tina Knowles

quote: A rainbow is the product of physics working for your appreciation of beauty.
name: Kyle Hill

quote: Real beauty is to be true to oneself. That's what makes me feel good.
name: Laetitia Casta

quote: Look after yourself from within, and your beauty will shine through on your skin.
name: Shanina Shaik

quote: Endurance is nobler than strength, and patience than beauty.
name: John Ruskin

quote: There is a kind of beauty in imperfection.
name: Conrad Hall

quote: Perhaps the mission of an artist is to interpret beauty to people - the beauty within themselves.
name: Langston Hughes

quote: 'Beauty is truth, truth beauty,' - that is all ye know on earth, and all ye need to know.
name: John Keats

quote: I don't think of all the misery but of the beauty that still remains.
name: Anne Frank

quote: The beauty of reading is that it lets you travel in a way you could never know.
name: Alek Wek

quote: For the mind disturbed, the still beauty of dawn is nature's finest balm.
name: Edwin Way Teale

quote: Beauty is in the heart of the beholder.
name: H. G. Wells

quote: Beauty is not caused. It is.
name: Emily Dickinson

quote: Beauty of whatever kind, in its supreme development, invariably excites the sensitive soul to tears.
name: Edgar Allan Poe

quote: She is a peacock in everything but beauty.
name: Oscar Wilde

quote: I am among those who think that science has great beauty.
name: Marie Curie

quote: Life has sweetness to it and a beauty and a power that I wanted to celebrate.
name: Valerie Harper

quote: Competence, like truth, beauty, and contact lenses, is in the eye of the beholder.
name: Laurence J. Peter

quote: There is beauty and humility in imperfection.
name: Guillermo del Toro

quote: To me, teamwork is the beauty of our sport, where you have five acting as one. You become selfless.
name: Mike Krzyzewski

quote: Beauty is but a flower, which wrinkles will devour.
name: Thomas Nashe

quote: It is amazing how complete is the delusion that beauty is goodness.
name: Leo Tolstoy

quote: Beauty is the first test: there is no permanent place in the world for ugly mathematics.
name: G. H. Hardy

quote: True beauty is when someone radiates that they like themselves.
name: Aimee Mullins

quote: Let us live for the beauty of our own reality.
name: Charles Lamb

quote: Natural beauty takes at least two hours in front of a mirror.
name: Pamela Anderson

quote: I find beauty in imperfection.
name: Rachel Morrison

quote: Beauty is the bait which with delight allures man to enlarge his kind.
name: Socrates

quote: Beauty is worse than wine, it intoxicates both the holder and beholder.
name: Aldous Huxley

quote: Beauty is the lover's gift.
name: William Congreve

quote: We find delight in the beauty and happiness of children that makes the heart too big for the body.
name: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: She got her looks from her father. He's a plastic surgeon.
name: Groucho Marx

quote: There is no cosmetic for beauty like happiness.
name: Maria Mitchell

quote: I always loved aesthetics. Not particularly fashion, but an idea of beauty.
name: Miuccia Prada

quote: Nail polish is like the icing on the beauty cake.
name: Mary Helen Bowers

quote: Those who find beauty in all of nature will find themselves at one with the secrets of life itself.
name: L. Wolfe Gilbert

quote: The beauty we love is very silent. It smiles softly to itself, but never speaks.
name: Richard Le Gallienne

quote: To me, 'sexy' is a kind of beauty, a kind of self-expression, one that is to be celebrated.
name: Emily Ratajkowski

quote: A bachelor never quite gets over the idea that he is a thing of beauty and a boy forever.
name: Helen Rowland

quote: Personal beauty is a greater recommendation than any letter of reference.
name: Aristotle

quote: Virtue has a veil, vice a mask.
name: Victor Hugo

quote: Everyday life is like programming, I guess. If you love something you can put beauty into it.
name: Donald Knuth

quote: Should you shield the canyons from the windstorms you would never see the true beauty of their carvings.
name: Elisabeth Kubler-Ross

quote: Art requires philosophy, just as philosophy requires art. Otherwise, what would become of beauty?
name: Paul Gauguin

quote: You're beautiful, like a May fly.
name: Ernest Hemingway

quote: I think there are very few people who have a real style, a real personality, and real beauty.
name: Marisa Berenson

quote: For every moment of triumph, for every instance of beauty, many souls must be trampled.
name: Hunter S. Thompson

quote: I can barely conceive of a type of beauty in which there is no Melancholy.
name: Charles Baudelaire

quote: I'm not ugly, but my beauty is a total creation.
name: Georg Wilhelm Friedrich Hegel

quote: Cherish sunsets, wild creatures and wild places. Have a love affair with the wonder and beauty of the earth.
name: Stewart Udall

quote: Beauty awakens the soul to act.
name: Dante Alighieri

quote: The seventies is what I love. Soft, touchable beauty is what I love.
name: Tom Ford

quote: I love faces that have freckles. I love faces that have wrinkles. For me, beauty is naturalism, I guess.
name: Rachel Morrison

quote: I'm attracted to soccer's capacity for beauty. When well played, the game is a dance with a ball.
name: Eduardo Galeano

quote: Faith goes out through the window when beauty comes in at the door.
name: George Edward Moore

quote: I've learned that when God promises beauty through the ashes, He means it.
name: Taya Kyle

quote: Laughter and joy are part of the beauty of life.
name: Diogo Morgado

quote: Beauty is a short-lived tyranny.
name: Socrates

quote: Solitude has its own very strange beauty to it.
name: Liv Tyler

quote: The perception of beauty is a moral test.
name: Henry David Thoreau

quote: I would never like to endorse a fairness cream. I believe in natural beauty.
name: Esha Gupta

quote: Glamour comes from within. My beauty regime begins with my personality.
name: Barry Humphries

quote: Once you go inside and weed through the muck, you will find the real beauty, the truth about yourself.
name: Lindsay Wagner

quote: I have often said that the lure of flying is the lure of beauty.
name: Amelia Earhart

quote: The beauty of independence, departure, actions that rely on themselves.
name: Walt Whitman

quote: Design is not making beauty, beauty emerges from selection, affinities, integration, love.
name: Louis Kahn

quote: I always find beauty in things that are odd and imperfect - they are much more interesting.
name: Marc Jacobs

quote: The beauty of having short hair is that I actually can wash and style it at home!
name: Meagan Good

quote: Exuberance is beauty.
name: William Blake

quote: Beauty is only skin deep. I think what's really important is finding a balance of mind, body and spirit.
name: Jennifer Lopez

quote: There's no such thing is aging, but maturing and knowledge. It's beautiful, I call that beauty.
name: Celine Dion

quote: Beauty is a radiance that originates from within and comes from inner security and strong character.
name: Jane Seymour

quote: Faces that have charmed us the most escape us the soonest.
name: Walter Scott

quote: Beauty is grace and confidence. I've learned to accept and appreciate what nature gave me.
name: Lindsay Lohan

quote: Sleeping and water are lifesavers - that's true beauty right there.
name: Sofia Boutella

quote: Beauty is variable, ugliness is constant.
name: Douglas Horton

quote: The beauty of Judaism is that it demands we ask questions, especially of ourselves.
name: Edgar Bronfman, Sr.

quote: Nonsense and beauty have close connections.
name: E. M. Forster

quote: Fast cars like Porsches and Ferraris - they are things of beauty.
name: Rod Stewart

quote: There are elements of intrinsic beauty in the simplification of a house built on the log cabin idea.
name: Gustav Stickley

quote: Beauty and the devil are the same thing.
name: Robert Mapplethorpe

quote: Beauty is perfect in its imperfections, so you just have to go with the imperfections.
name: Diane von Furstenberg

quote: Beauty may be skin deep, but ugly goes clear to the bone.
name: Redd Foxx

quote: Beauty in art is often nothing but ugliness subdued.
name: Jean Rostand

quote: Beauty means expression and being your most authentic self.
name: Paloma Elsesser

quote: Mozart's music is so pure and beautiful that I see it as a reflection of the inner beauty of the universe.
name: Albert Einstein

quote: I decided that if I could paint that flower in a huge scale, you could not ignore its beauty.
name: Georgia O'Keeffe

quote: I think Sydney has so much natural beauty; it's just a beautiful city.
name: Flume

quote: As we grow old, the beauty steals inward.
name: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: Today I see beauty everywhere I go, in every face I see, in every single soul.
name: Kevyn Aucoin

quote: Since love grows within you, so beauty grows. For love is the beauty of the soul.
name: Saint Augustine

quote: I see flaws as a kind of beauty.
name: Karan Mahajan

quote: Beauty when unadorned is adorned the most.
name: St. Jerome

quote: What would be ugly in a garden constitutes beauty in a mountain.
name: Victor Hugo

quote: You know when I feel inwardly beautiful? When I am with my girlfriends and we are having a 'goddess circle'.
name: Jennifer Aniston

quote: There is in true beauty, as in courage, something which narrow souls cannot dare to admire.
name: William Congreve

quote: Beauty doesn't need ornaments. Softness can't bear the weight of ornaments.
name: Munshi Premchand

quote: Love built on beauty, soon as beauty, dies.
name: John Donne

quote: Social media has revolutionised how beauty is curated, captured, and consumed.
name: Pat McGrath

quote: Beauty is subjective and should not be limited to only what we see on the outside.
name: Alek Wek

quote: Beauty is the promise of happiness.
name: Edmund Burke

quote: The kind of beauty I want most is the hard-to-get kind that comes from within - strength, courage, dignity.
name: Ruby Dee

quote: It is not sufficient to see and to know the beauty of a work. We must feel and be affected by it.
name: Voltaire

quote: Beauty, whether moral or natural, is felt, more properly than perceived.
name: David Hume

quote: Aging has a wonderful beauty and we should have respect for that.
name: Eartha Kitt

quote: Perfect is boring: Beauty is irregular.
name: Gloria Steinem

quote: What the imagination seizes as beauty must be truth.
name: John Keats

quote: Beauty is the greatest seducer of man.
name: Paulo Coelho

quote: Seek goodness and be goodness. Seek beauty and be beauty. Seek love and be love.
name: Bryant H. McGill

quote: Nothing surpasses the beauty and elegance of a bad idea.
name: Craig Bruce

quote: Find your own way, have an open spirit, and believe in your own beauty.
name: Francois Nars

quote: The original theme of 'Beauty and the Beast' is don't judge a book by its cover. Love what's inside.
name: Jay Ryan

quote: Zest is the secret of all beauty. There is no beauty that is attractive without zest.
name: Christian Dior

quote: Beauty in distress is much the most affecting beauty.
name: Edmund Burke

quote: There is beauty when something works and it works intuitively.
name: Jonathan Ive

quote: I am a thing of beauty.
name: Frank Sinatra

quote: Truth is a thing immortal and perpetual, and it gives to us a beauty that fades not away in time.
name: Frank Norris

quote: To me, beauty is inclusion - every size, every color - that's the world I live in.
name: Prabal Gurung

quote: If you get simple beauty and naught else, you get about the best thing God invents.
name: Robert Browning

quote: Great perils have this beauty, that they bring to light the fraternity of strangers.
name: Victor Hugo

quote: Physical beauty isn't so impressive to me.
name: Dita Von Teese

quote: Wisdom is the abstract of the past, but beauty is the promise of the future.
name: Oliver Wendell Holmes, Sr.

quote: Beauty comes in all forms. It's not just external; it's internal as well.
name: Alessia Cara

quote: Beauty of mind creates freedom. Freedom of mind creates beauty.
name: Ann Demeulemeester

quote: All the great religions have a place for awe, for ecstatic transport at the wonder and beauty of creation.
name: Richard Dawkins

quote: Goodness is beauty in the best estate.
name: Christopher Marlowe

quote: I consider fitness, diet, and beauty to be essential to a balanced self.
name: Hannah Bronfman

quote: Like charity, I believe glamour should begin at home.
name: Loretta Young

quote: The human soul needs actual beauty more than bread.
name: D. H. Lawrence

quote: Sunscreen, in the world of beauty, is the ultimate in adulting.
name: Emily Weiss

quote: I believe that true beauty of chess is more than enough to satisfy all possible demands.
name: Alexander Alekhine

quote: There is hope and a kind of beauty in there somewhere, if you look for it.
name: H. R. Giger

quote: Beauty seen is never lost, God's colors all are fast.
name: John Greenleaf Whittier

quote: Prom drops girls squarely into the beauty spending pipeline.
name: Rachel Simmons

quote: It was Chicago with its World's Fair which vivified the national desire for civic beauty.
name: Daniel Burnham

quote: That's the beauty of the animation process: It takes so long, you have so many chances to improve it.
name: Phil Lord

quote: Coming in solemn beauty like slow old tunes of Spain.
name: John Masefield

quote: Wealth, beauty, and fame are transient. When those are gone, little is left except the need to be useful.
name: Gene Tierney

quote: I consider myself a woman endowed with inner beauty.
name: Leila Lopes

quote: As for everything else, so for a mathematical theory: beauty can be perceived but not explained.
name: Arthur Cayley

quote: That's the beauty of the Internet is that we're no longer tied to our communities by physical connections.
name: Edward Snowden

quote: Beauty is one of the rare things which does not lead to doubt of God.
name: Jean Anouilh

quote: Where is there beauty when you see deprivation and starvation?
name: Rosalind Russell

quote: I wasn't afraid of getting old, because I was never a great beauty.
name: Shirley MacLaine

quote: Beauty at 70 years old isn't the same as beauty at 20 years old, but it is stunning nonetheless.
name: Victoria Moran

quote: There is art and beauty and power in the primal images of fantasy.
name: Guillermo del Toro

quote: I'm not trying to stump anybody... it's the beauty of the language that I'm interested in.
name: Buddy Holly

quote: I do love to capture beauty in this world. And photos can last the test of time.
name: Nathaniel Buzolic

quote: The last thing left in nature is the beauty of women.
name: Peter Beard

quote: I was not a good-lookin' girl. I was extremely skinny. I wasn't pretty. I wasn't cool.
name: Celine Dion

quote: Having inner beauty is something you develop on your own, and I like to think I have that.
name: Cindy Margolis

quote: No spring nor summer beauty hath such grace as I have seen in one autumnal face.
name: John Donne

quote: I always say that kindness is the greatest beauty that you can have.
name: Andie MacDowell

quote: Beauty without grace is the hook without the bait.
name: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: Beauty is an outward gift, which is seldom despised, except by those to whom it has been refused.
name: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: Alas! how little does the memory of these human inhabitants enhance the beauty of the landscape!
name: Henry David Thoreau

quote: I heard the old, old, men say 'all that's beautiful drifts away, like the waters.'
name: William Butler Yeats

quote: Beauty and folly are old companions.
name: Benjamin Franklin

quote: I'm no natural beauty. If I'm gonna have any looks at all, I'm gonna have to create them.
name: Dolly Parton

quote: Rare is the union of beauty and purity.
name: Juvenal

quote: Grace is the beauty of form under the influence of freedom.
name: Friedrich Schiller

quote: Only on paper has humanity yet achieved glory, beauty, truth, knowledge, virtue, and abiding love.
name: George Bernard Shaw

quote: Why hurry over beautiful things? Why not linger and enjoy them?
name: Clara Schumann

quote: I like a girl with natural beauty.
name: Chandler Parsons

quote: Our hearts were drunk with a beauty Our eyes could never see.
name: George William Russell

quote: Beauty is a short-lived tyranny.
name: George Bernard Shaw

quote: Beauty is all very well at first sight; but who ever looks at it when it has been in the house three days?
name: George Bernard Shaw

quote: Pay attention to the beauty surrounding you.
name: Anne Lamott

quote: Both for Havana's beauty and decay, it's very hard to restrain yourself from staring everywhere you look.
name: Brin-Jonathan Butler

quote: A woman whose smile is open and whose expression is glad has a kind of beauty no matter what she wears.
name: Anne Roiphe

quote: It's important to believe in yourself and the beauty of your dreams and to not let anyone tell you different.
name: Victoria Arlen

quote: Inner beauty should be the most important part of improving one's self.
name: Priscilla Presley

quote: This is the artist, then, life's hungry man, the glutton of eternity, beauty's miser, glory's slave.
name: Tom Wolfe

quote: A witty woman is a treasure; a witty beauty is a power.
name: George Meredith

quote: I like beauty to be a bit edgy, not typical. For me, the only rule is looking good.
name: Francois Nars

quote: I would like to say to people, open your eyes and find beauty where you normally don't expect it.
name: Jean Paul Gaultier

quote: I think permitting the game to become too physical takes away a little bit of the beauty.
name: John Wooden

quote: And beauty immortal awakes from the tomb.
name: James Beattie

quote: Genetics is all about showcasing human beauty along with high-quality performance.
name: Bela Karolyi

quote: Embrace the color of your skin and your own beauty.
name: Yuna

quote: Love is the attempt to form a friendship inspired by beauty.
name: Marcus Tullius Cicero

quote: There is no excellent beauty that hath not some strangeness in the proportion.
name: Francis Bacon

quote: Have the pride of the brown girl and know that you'll figure out your own beauty in time.
name: Tamara Taylor

quote: Art is beauty, the perpetual invention of detail, the choice of words, the exquisite care of execution.
name: Theophile Gautier

quote: Through my optimism I naturally prefer and capture the beauty in life.
name: Leni Riefenstahl

quote: To love beauty is to see light.
name: Victor Hugo

quote: The beauty of a face is not a separate quality but a relation or proportion of qualities to each other.
name: George Herbert Mead

quote: The moment you cheat for the sake of beauty, you know you're an artist.
name: David Hockney

quote: Beauty is the sole ambition, the exclusive goal of Taste.
name: Charles Baudelaire

quote: The absence of flaw in beauty is itself a flaw.
name: Havelock Ellis

quote: Beauty is in the eye of the beholder.
name: Oliver Platt

quote: The woman with dark hair, wide hips, and a few extra pounds has always been the essence of beauty in Morocco.
name: Fatema Mernissi

quote: Ugliness is in a way superior to beauty because it lasts.
name: Serge Gainsbourg

quote: Beauty is a fragile gift.
name: Ovid

quote: Beauty is a manifestation of secret natural laws, which otherwise would have been hidden from us forever.
name: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quote: Just because you are blind and unable to see my beauty doesn't mean it does not exist.
name: Margaret Cho

quote: Light, God's eldest daughter, is a principal beauty in a building.
name: Thomas Fuller

quote: A sculptor wields The chisel, and the stricken marble grows To beauty.
name: William Cullen Bryant

quote: I think that something needs to be weird in order to have a real beauty.
name: Carine Roitfeld

quote: For all of nature's wonder and beauty, it is also hostile and unpredictable.
name: Liam Neeson

quote: Beauty magazines make my girlfriend feel ugly.
name: James De La Vega

quote: Los Angeles is like a beauty parlor at the end of the universe.
name: Emily Mortimer

quote: Beauty in things exists in the mind which contemplates them.
name: David Hume

quote: Whatever you may look like, marry a man your own age - as your beauty fades, so will his eyesight.
name: Phyllis Diller

quote: All the freaky people make the beauty of the world.
name: Michael Franti

quote: Cinderella is not only an iconic character when it comes to beauty, grace and fairytale love, but also shoes.
name: Christian Louboutin

quote: There is no personal achievement in being born beautiful.
name: Loretta Young

quote: Every performance is different. That's the beauty of it.
name: Van Morrison

quote: I find short, fast romances romantic. There's a beauty to dark imagery.
name: Sam Smith

quote: Beauty, to me is about being comfortable in your own skin.
name: Gwyneth Paltrow

quote: The fun part of being a girl is that there are little beauty things you can do to make yourself feel special.
name: Jennifer Love Hewitt

quote: 'Green Garden' is about beauty and joy and lush green and dance and excitement and smiling from within.
name: Laura Mvula

quote: In youth and beauty, wisdom is but rare!
name: Homer

quote: Every girl should use what Mother Nature gave her before Father Time takes it away.
name: Laurence J. Peter

quote: It's not beauty but fine qualities, my girl, that keep a husband.
name: Euripides

quote: I really believe that beauty comes from health - sensible eating and exercise.
name: Dita Von Teese

quote: I never quite understood why Disney hadn't made a sincere fairy tale since 'Beauty and the Beast.'
name: John Lasseter

quote: Beauty itself is but the sensible image of the Infinite.
name: Francis Bacon

quote: I also became close to nature, and am now able to appreciate the beauty with which this world is endowed.
name: James Dean

quote: For me, physical beauty is never the reason for attraction to anyone.
name: Katrina Kaif

quote: By its very nature the beautiful is isolated from everything else. From beauty no road leads to reality.
name: Hannah Arendt

quote: The only rich person is a person who is rich in spirit. I have no money deposit. I have only beauty deposit.
name: Imelda Marcos

quote: What is man's ultimate direction in life? It is to look for love, truth, virtue, and beauty.
name: Shinichi Suzuki

quote: In the end, long life is the reward, strength, and beauty.
name: Grace Paley

quote: Life deprived of beauty is not worthy of being called human.
name: Luis Barragan

quote: For me the greatest beauty always lies in the greatest clarity.
name: Gotthold Ephraim Lessing

quote: Time takes the ugliness and horror out of death and turns it into beauty.
name: Dodie Smith

quote: The terrifying and edible beauty of Art Nouveau architecture.
name: Salvador Dali

quote: There is real beauty in my eyes when I lose my mind.
name: Jessica Hagedorn

quote: Beauty, the eternal Spouse of the Wisdom of God and Angel of his Presence thru' all creation.
name: Robert Bridges

quote: The cottage garden; most for use designed, Yet not of beauty destitute.
name: Charlotte Smith

quote: Beauty is altogether in the eye of the beholder.
name: Lew Wallace

quote: There is certainly no absolute standard of beauty. That precisely is what makes its pursuit so interesting.
name: John Kenneth Galbraith

quote: I find beauty in the grotesque, like most artists.
name: Alexander McQueen

quote: Beauty is merciless. You do not look at it, it looks at you and does not forgive.
name: Nikos Kazantzakis

quote: Teach us that wealth is not elegance, that profusion is not magnificence, that splendor is not beauty.
name: Benjamin Disraeli

quote: I think confidence is a true form of beauty.
name: Becky G

quote: The beauty of what Apple does at Apple is that they're not on trend; they are classic.
name: Anna Wintour

quote: Beauty is not just physical.
name: Halle Berry

quote: The love of beauty in its multiple forms is the noblest gift of the human cerebrum.
name: Alexis Carrel

quote: It is the addition of strangeness to beauty that constitutes the romantic character in art.
name: Walter Hagen

quote: Beauty products always cheer me up and give me hope. If it makes you feel pretty, why not?
name: Salma Hayek

quote: As a busy working mom I'm always pressed for time, so a quick and easy beauty routine is key!
name: Angela Kinsey

quote: There is a role and function for beauty in our time.
name: Tadao Ando

quote: An exile reads change the way he reads time, memory, self, love, fear, beauty: in the key of loss.
name: Andre Aciman

quote: Taking joy in living is a woman's best cosmetic.
name: Rosalind Russell

quote: People don't associate red hair, pale skin, and freckles with beauty.
name: Shirley Manson

quote: It's sad when girls think they don't have anything going on except being pretty.
name: Keri Russell

quote: What delights us in visible beauty is the invisible.
name: Marie von Ebner-Eschenbach

quote: Beauty and brains, pleasure and usability - they should go hand in hand.
name: Donald Norman

quote: Beauty is the oracle that speaks to us all.
name: Luis Barragan

quote: Whenever I see a nighttime picture of Earth from space, with its glowing lights, I am stirred by its beauty.
name: David Grinspoon

quote: No eyes that have seen beauty ever lose their sight.
name: Jean Toomer

quote: A child does not notice the greatness and the beauty of nature and the splendor of God in his works.
name: Rudolf Otto

quote: I really do believe that inner beauty is so much more than any kind of outer beauty.
name: Rachele Brooke Smith

quote: O human beauty, what a dream art thou, that we should cast our life and hopes away on thee!
name: Bryan Procter

quote: Chris Cornell painted in song the darkness and beauty of life in Seattle.
name: Mike McCready

quote: Life is one long decay, no? There's a lot of beauty in it. Like the patina in an old city.
name: Urs Fischer

quote: You don't have to save the world, but you can be in the world-that's where the beauty comes from.
name: Daphne Zuniga

quote: In Wyoming, the beauty of our mountains is matched only by the grit of our people.
name: Liz Cheney

quote: The beauty of women was the first expression of my photography.
name: Alberto Korda

quote: I have beauty, intelligence, individuality, sensuality and sexuality.
name: Shannon Tweed

quote: I want, of course, peace, grace, and beauty. How do you do that? You work for it.
name: Studs Terkel

quote: You can only perceive real beauty in a person as they get older.
name: Anouk Aimee

quote: Beauty, n: the power by which a woman charms a lover and terrifies a husband.
name: Ambrose Bierce

quote: The ideal beauty is a fugitive which is never found.
name: Joan Rivers

quote: Beauty has a lot to do with character.
name: Kevyn Aucoin

quote: In every man's heart there is a secret nerve that answers to the vibrations of beauty.
name: Christopher Morley

quote: All cities are mad: but the madness is gallant. All cities are beautiful: but the beauty is grim.
name: Christopher Morley

quote: The key to education is the experience of beauty.
name: Friedrich Schiller

quote: Whether you come from heaven or hell, what does it matter, O Beauty!
name: Charles Baudelaire

quote: My beauty secret is absolutely no sun.
name: Vivienne Westwood

quote: Rarely do great beauty and great virtue dwell together.
name: Petrarch

quote: I love beauty. But I like the beauty accidentally, not dished up, served up on a platter.
name: Wole Soyinka

quote: I am slightly obsessed with beauty products.
name: Marley Dias

quote: I gave my beauty and my youth to men. I am going to give my wisdom and experience to animals.
name: Brigitte Bardot

quote: Beauty makes idiots sad and wise men merry.
name: George Jean Nathan

quote: My favourite beauty look is definitely '70s beauty - sun kissed skin, wavy hair and defined eyes.
name: Erin Heatherton

quote: The beautiful seems right by force of beauty, and the feeble wrong because of weakness.
name: Virginia Woolf

quote: Blues and soul and jazz music has so much pain, so much beauty of raw emotion and passion.
name: Christina Aguilera

quote: Real beauty knocks you a little bit off kilter.
name: David Byrne

quote: Directors don't call you for your beauty but for your talent.
name: Monica Bellucci

quote: Sleep is the real beauty secret, but I don't get enough of that.
name: Chelsea Leyland

quote: Oh who can tell the range of joy or set the bounds of beauty?
name: Sara Teasdale

quote: Beauty shouldn't be superficial and should come from within, and your eyes will tell the story.
name: Michelle Yeoh

quote: The achievement is appreciation. Your ability to be surprised and awed by beauty!
name: William Hurt

quote: Integrity reveals beauty.
name: Thomas Leonard

quote: Because beauty isn't enough, there must be something more.
name: Eva Herzigova

quote: There's not enough said about the beauty of being able to focus on what you do well.
name: Kimberly Bryant

quote: I think beauty comes from within, and society paints a ridiculous picture.
name: Rachel Bilson

quote: We are learning, too, that the love of beauty is one of Nature's greatest healers.
name: Ellsworth Huntington

quote: Latin life is rich with warmth, family values and history. I want to bring that beauty into American homes.
name: Cristina Saralegui

quote: A healthful hunger for a great idea is the beauty and blessedness of life.
name: Jean Ingelow

quote: My livelihood depends on my surface beauty, but when I wash my face, I see a real person there.
name: Marie Helvin

quote: To find beauty in the most grotesque things is a gift.
name: Seph Lawless

quote: Most people can't see beauty and love. I see our music as medicine.
name: Maurice White

quote: The beauty of cable is you could program for 18-year-old twins and get a hit show on cable.
name: Robert Greenblatt

quote: To give pain is the tyranny; to make happy, the true empire of beauty.
name: Samuel Butler

quote: I made myself famous by writing 'songs' and lyrics about the beauty of the things I did and ugliness, too.
name: Jack Kerouac

quote: It is well known that Beauty does not look with a good grace on the timid advances of Humour.
name: W. Somerset Maugham

quote: I feel the reason people started using 'me too' is there is beauty and power in those words.
name: Tarana Burke

quote: Beauty is whatever gives joy.
name: Edna St. Vincent Millay

quote: How goodness heightens beauty!
name: Milan Kundera

quote: At fifteen, beauty and talent do not exist; there can only be promise of the coming woman.
name: Honore de Balzac

quote: Strength of character may be learned at work, but beauty of character is learned at home.
name: Henry Drummond

quote: My duty is to try to reach beauty. Cinema is emotion. When you laugh you cry.
name: Roberto Benigni

quote: I am not fighting for success, just to get more beauty out of myself and share it with more people.
name: Ben Okri

quote: In your 20s you can be pretty, but you don't accomplish real beauty until you find wisdom and depth.
name: Evangeline Lilly

quote: It is easy to be beautiful; it is difficult to appear so.
name: Hosea Ballou

quote: Not just as a black woman, but as a woman, since the beginning of time, beauty has been our responsibility.
name: Nicole Ari Parker

quote: What beauty is, I know not, though it adheres to many things.
name: Albrecht Durer

quote: A women's greatest asset is her beauty.
name: Alex Comfort

quote: Beauty is the first present nature gives to women and the first it takes away.
name: Fay Weldon

quote: A beauty is a woman you notice; a charmer is one who notices you.
name: Adlai Stevenson I

quote: I'm a drugstore beauty girl, I love going to the drugstore and buying makeup.
name: Melanie Fiona

quote: Beauty is only skin deep.
name: Thomas Overbury

quote: I've inherited so much culture, beauty, and love, and I'm the perfect mix of Philomena.
name: Philomena Kwao

quote: People come to see beauty, and I dance to give it to them.
name: Judith Jamison

quote: We have to get back to the beauty of just being alive in this present moment.
name: Mary McDonnell

quote: The beauty of democracy is that an average, random, unremarkable citizen can lead it.
name: P. J. O'Rourke

quote: Beauty, to me, is kind, generous, and people that are humble.
name: Nikki Sixx

quote: As soon as beauty is sought not from religion and love, but for pleasure, it degrades the seeker.
name: Annie Dillard

quote: I'd like to grow up and be beautiful. I know it doesn't matter, but it doesn't hurt.
name: Kirsten Dunst

quote: Things are beautiful if you love them.
name: Jean Anouilh

quote: My everyday beauty routine is always rushed and pretty simple.
name: Cate Blanchett

quote: I don't need plastic in my body to validate me as a woman.
name: Courtney Love

quote: I sincerely feel that beauty largely comes from within.
name: Christy Turlington

quote: Beauty is that which is simultaneously attractive and sublime.
name: Karl Wilhelm Friedrich Schlegel

quote: Beauty is only temporary, but your mind lasts you a lifetime.
name: Alicia Machado

quote: Beauty, more than bitterness, makes the heart break.
name: Sara Teasdale

quote: Always think of what is useful and not what is beautiful. Beauty will come of its own accord.
name: Nikolai Gogol

quote: I can see a great beauty in acknowledging the fact that the world is dark.
name: David Rakoff

quote: The beautiful remains so in ugly surroundings.
name: Malcolm de Chazal

quote: When everything else physical and mental seems to diminish, the appreciation of beauty is on the increase.
name: Bernard Berenson

quote: If beauty isn't genius it usually signals at least a high level of animal cunning.
name: Peter York

quote: My version of makeup is a really intense skin regimen. I just think it's a healthier way to look at beauty.
name: Paloma Elsesser

quote: It's amazing what sleep does for your looks.
name: Emily Procter

quote: Beauty is less important than quality.
name: Eugene Ormandy

quote: The plainer the dress, the greater luster does beauty appear.
name: Edward Wood, 1st Earl of Halifax
